tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drone_telemetry_data (
    telemetry_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    altitude FLOAT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    speed FLOAT,
    battery_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT NOT NULL,
    flight_date DATE NOT NULL,
    flight_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    flight_path GEOGRAPHY
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    max_speed FLOAT,
    battery_life INT
)

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
    altitude FLOAT,
    speed FLOAT,
    battery_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    mission_status VARCHAR(255),
    flight_path STRING
)

CREATE TABLE drones (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_name STRING,
    max_speed FLOAT,
    max_altitude INT,
    status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    altitude INT,
    speed FLOAT,
    battery_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES drones(id)
);

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    flight_duration INT,
    distance_covered FLOAT,
    average_speed FLOAT,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES drones(id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type STRING,
    technician_name STRING,
    details STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES drones(id)
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  serial_number VARCHAR(50),
  max_speed FLOAT,
  max_altitude INT
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
  data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  altitude INT,
  speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_errors (
  error_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  error_code VARCHAR(20),
  error_message TEXT,
  error_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE operation_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  drone_id INT,
  operation_type VARCHAR(50),
  operation_description TEXT
);
